history.content:
Hello all,

 

Are you passionate about equity & inclusion? Do you want to change the climate in CoE? Are you interested in creating new initiatives that will be presented directly to the college deans?

Apply to become a representative for your engineering department now! Use the tinyurl below to apply today - applications are due March 25, Wednesday, at 11:59 pm.

tinyurl.com/e-i-app-2020

As a representative of your engineering major(s), you will attend weekly/biweekly meetings with student leaders from culture & identity organizations in CoE and contribute your ideas and input. You will get the chance to work closely with a small committee to formulate a cohesive plan for equity & inclusion that will be presented directly to the Dean of Equity & Inclusion, the Dean of Student Affairs, the ESS, etc.

If you have any questions about the application or the position, email cmconniemi@berkeley.edu. We hope to read your application soon!

 

Connie Mi 

ESC | Internal Vice President
history.subject: Apply to be in the Equity and Inclusion Committee!
